select.id: getサービス提供証明書一覧

mapper.select:
SELECT BASIC."hiHokenshaNo", BASIC."serviceTeikyoYM", BASIC."seiriNp", BASIC."yoshikiNo", BASIC."jigyoshaNo", KAIGOB."jigyoshaName", BASIC."meisaiNo", SHIKIBETSUB."ryakusho" FROM rgdb."DbT3038ShokanKihon" BASIC LEFT JOIN (SELECT KAIGOJIGYOSHA."jigyoshaNo", KAIGOJIGYOSHA."jigyoshaName" FROM rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" KAIGOJIGYOSHA, (SELECT MAX(KAIGO."yukoKaishiYMD") AS "yukoKaishiYMD", KAIGO."jigyoshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" KAIGO WHERE KAIGO."yukoKaishiYMD" <= #{serviceTeikyoYM} AND (KAIGO."yukoShuryoYMD" IS NULL OR KAIGO."yukoShuryoYMD" >= #{serviceTeikyoYM}) GROUP BY KAIGO."jigyoshaNo" ) AS KAIGOA WHERE KAIGOA."yukoKaishiYMD" = KAIGOJIGYOSHA."yukoKaishiYMD" AND KAIGOA."jigyoshaNo" = KAIGOJIGYOSHA."jigyoshaNo" ) AS KAIGOB ON BASIC."jigyoshaNo" = KAIGOB."jigyoshaNo" LEFT JOIN (SELECT SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."shikibetsuNo", SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."ryakusho" FROM rgdb."DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri" SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI, (SELECT MAX(SHIKIBETSU."tekiyoKaishiYM") AS "tekiyoKaishiYM", SHIKIBETSU."shikibetsuNo" FROM rgdb."DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri" SHIKIBETSU WHERE SHIKIBETSU."tekiyoKaishiYM" <= #{serviceTeikyoYM} AND (SHIKIBETSU."tekiyoShuryoYM" IS NULL OR SHIKIBETSU."tekiyoShuryoYM" >= #{serviceTeikyoYM}) GROUP BY SHIKIBETSU."shikibetsuNo" ) AS SHIKIBETSUA WHERE SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."shikibetsuNo" = SHIKIBETSUA."shikibetsuNo" AND SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."tekiyoKaishiYM" = SHIKIBETSUA."tekiyoKaishiYM" ) AS SHIKIBETSUB ON BASIC."yoshikiNo" = SHIKIBETSUB."shikibetsuNo"
WHERE BASIC."serviceTeikyoYM" = #{serviceTeikyoYM} AND BASIC."hiHokenshaNo" = #{hiHokenshaNo} AND BASIC."seiriNp" = #{seiriNo} AND BASIC."yoshikiNo" = #{yoshikiNo} ORDER BY BASIC."jigyoshaNo" ASC ,KAIGOB."jigyoshaName" ASC ,BASIC."meisaiNo" ASC ,SHIKIBETSUB."ryakusho" ASC

select.id: get償還払請求明細住特一覧
get償還払請求サービス計画200904データ
get償還払請求サービス計画200604データ
get償還払請求サービス計画200004データ
get償還払請求集計データ
get償還払請求社会福祉法人軽減額データ

mapper.select: SELECT SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI.* FROM rgdb."DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri" SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI WHERE SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."shikibetsuNo" = #{yoshikiNo} AND SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."tekiyoKaishiYM" <= #{serviceTeikyoYM} AND (SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."tekiyoShuryoYM" IS NULL OR substring(SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."tekiyoShuryoYM", 1, 6) >= #{serviceTeikyoYM}) ORDER BY SHIKIBETSUNOKANRI."tekiyoKaishiYM" DESC

SELECT KAIGOJIGYOSHA.* FROM rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" KAIGOJIGYOSHA WHERE KAIGOJIGYOSHA."jigyoshaNo" = #{jigyoshaNo} AND substring(KAIGOJIGYOSHA."yukoKaishiYMD", 1, 6) <= #{serviceTeikyoYM} AND (KAIGOJIGYOSHA."yukoShuryoYMD" IS NULL OR substring(KAIGOJIGYOSHA."yukoShuryoYMD", 1, 6) >= #{serviceTeikyoYM}) ORDER BY KAIGOJIGYOSHA."yukoKaishiYMD" DESC

select.id: get特定診療サービスコード

mapper.select:
SELECT TOKUTEISHINRYOSERVICECODE.* FROM rgdb."DbT7120TokuteiShinryoServiceCode" TOKUTEISHINRYOSERVICECODE WHERE
TOKUTEISHINRYOSERVICECODE."serviceShuruiCode" = #{serviceShuruiCode} AND
TOKUTEISHINRYOSERVICECODE."serviceKomokuCode" = #{serviceKomokuCode} AND TOKUTEISHINRYOSERVICECODE."tekiyoKaishiYM" <= #{serviceTeikyoYM} AND (TOKUTEISHINRYOSERVICECODE."tekiyoShuryoYM" IS NULL OR TOKUTEISHINRYOSERVICECODE."tekiyoShuryoYM" >= #{serviceTeikyoYM}) ORDER BY TOKUTEISHINRYOSERVICECODE."tekiyoKaishiYM" DESC
